text: The Cocoanuts is a 1929 American musical comedy movie directed by Robert Florey and Joseph Santley and was based on the 1925 musical of the same name. It stars Marx Brothers, Mary Eaton, Oscar Shaw, Margaret Dumont, Kay Francis, Cyril Ring and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1929 comedy movies Category:1920s musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Florey Category:Movies directed by Joseph Santley
title: The Cocoanuts
